title: Strategy Domain Schema
description: Schema for the Strategy domain in the Orthogramic Metamodel

title.description: The name or title of the Strategy

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the Strategy entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the Strategy within the Organization

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the Strategy

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the Strategy is most closely linked

objectives.description: Specific measurable targets to achieve strategic goals

keyActivities.description: Critical actions necessary to implement the Strategy

resources.description: Resources allocated for the Strategy implementation

timeline.description: The timeline for achieving the Strategy

performanceIndicators.description: Metrics used to measure the success of the Strategy

dependencies.description: Other strategies, initiatives, or processes that the Strategy depends on

relatedStrategies.description: Strategies that are related or linked to this Strategy

risks.description: Potential risks associated with the Strategy and its implementation

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where the Strategy can be enhanced or improved

strategicAlignment.description: How the Strategy aligns with the Organizations strategic goals and objectives

businessObjective.description: A specific measurable goal that a company aims to achieve to support its overall Strategy

parent.description: A high-level Strategy that provides overarching principles or rules guiding business operations

child.description: A specific Strategy that falls under a broader parent Policy

strategicObjective.description: Strategic objectives that are part of this Strategy

title.description: The name or title of the strategic objective

description.description: A detailed explanation of what the strategic objective entails

purpose.description: The intended purpose or function of the strategic objective

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for the strategic objective

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the strategic objective is aligned

metrics.description: The measurable indicators used to assess the success of the objective

timeline.description: The timeframe within which the strategic objective should be achieved

stakeholders.description: The Stakeholders involved or affected by the strategic objective
